remarks: Ratio test for divergence of a complex infinite series.  See e.g. remark "if ` ( abs `` ( ( a `` ( n + 1 ) ) / ( a `` n ) ) ) >_ 1 ` for all large n..." in ~ https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ratio_test#The_test . (Contributed by Steve Rodriguez, 28-Feb-2020.)
